topic.title: Trademarks
topic.shortdesc: The following terms are trademarks of the Retro Tools in the United States, other countries, or both:

body.p: The following terms are trademarks of other companies:
Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, and Violot are registered trademarks of Rainbow Corporation and/or its affiliates.
Linux is a trademark of Linus Torvalds in the United States, other countries, or both.
Other company, product, or service names may be trademarks or service marks of others.
